PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Supreme safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, August 29, 1942, pg. 17, reads: "Ace Arbiter - Johnny Craig, Negro National League umpire, who has been the loop's outstanding umpire this season. Craig, a former player, returned to the diamond this year after a voluntary layoff of approximately three years.  He's rated tops by ball players."
TitMainTitle: Negro League baseball umpires John Craig and Moe Harris, on Forbes Field
